channel.title: No Sound
channel.description: Hello, I just loaded a game of Opposing Force and i noticed there was no sound. I checked the game's sound levels and they were fine. I checked my computer sound levels and they were fine. It even says that the speakers are registering sound but i'm not hearing anything. Does anyone know how to fix this? :[

item.title: No Sound

item.description:
Ah, he must have been quick because there was no ‘edited’ tag.

item.title: No Sound
item.dc:creator: FailCrash
item.description:
Lamsey:

Turn your speakers on?

I just figured out somehow the cable connecting to my speakers came lose. I dont know how this happened. It isn’t even a cable really. It’s like a small black box with a cable coming from the inside of it, running into the speaker port. Here’s a picture: https://www.arch.mcgill.ca/prof/mellin/arch671/winter2004/student/Morris/pics/A2-black-box-pic-2.jpg

Imagine that made out of plastic with a cable coming out of the hole in the side.
It is also very heavy and was put in securely.

Read full topic

Hello, I just loaded a game of Opposing Force and i noticed there was no sound. I checked the game’s sound levels and they were fine. I checked my computer sound levels and they were fine. It even says that the speakers are registering sound but i’m not hearing anything. Does anyone know how to fix this? :[
